events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this was not what I paid for.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request due to incorrect delivery based on the customer's complaint about receiving the wrong item.
An agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to the case to help resolve the customer's request efficiently.
Hello, thank you for contacting customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and would like a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo clearly showing the item I received, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and provide you with a return shipping label at no additional cost.
That sounds great, thank you for your prompt response and for making the refund process straightforward.
Your refund has been processed, and the return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and the return shipping label. Please inform us if everything is satisfactory.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been completed successfully. Thank you for your cooperation and patience.
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short survey about your support experience to help us improve.
